wordpressPage.title: Perseverance (Pen Behind The Ear)
wordpressPage.content:
You’ll need…some pens and this video of Tim Vine:

1 – Play this video of Tim Vine – YouTube Link

2 – Hand out some pens and get your group to have a go!

3 – Discuss how they found it. Was it easy? Did anyone manage it?

4 – What things in your life take lots of practice and perseverance?

Bible Verse: Read Philippians 3:14

5 – What goal do you think Paul is talking about?

6 – What does it mean to persevere with our relationship with God?
